name: Ahmed Khan
performance_notes: Ahmed shows excellent programming skills and consistent attendance. Needs improvement in English communication. Strong analytical abilities in Mathematics.

name: Fatima Ali
performance_notes: Fatima is a fantastic student with exceptional performance across all subjects. Excellent attendance and complete assignment submission. Shows leadership qualities in group projects.

name: Hassan Raza
performance_notes: Hassan is performing below average and requires immediate attention. Low attendance is affecting overall performance. Needs tutoring in Mathematics and Physics. Should focus on regular class attendance and assignment completion.

name: Ayesha Malik
performance_notes: Ayesha is an average student with steady performance. Good attendance but could improve in technical subjects. Strong in English and communication. Recommended to join study groups for Mathematics and Physics.
